title: Post-harvest revolution: 3 tech mega-trends shaping NZ horticulture in 2026 – Chris Bray
description: OPINION: We need machine-driven agriculture, but with human oversight and innovation.
content: The countrys food and fibre sector accounts for over 80% of goods exports, and the forecast export revenue growth of horticulture at 19% (year to June 30, 2025, according to the Ministry for Primary … [+6277 chars]
